Howto.title: How to request a locker
Howto.step1: Click on "Request locker" to request a locker.
Howto.step2: Enter your s-number (without the "s") and optionally your preferred location and row.
Howto.step3: Click on "Send request". You will receive an email at your stud.uni-frankfurt.de address.
Howto.step4: Open the email and click on the confirmation link to verify your request.
Howto.step5: Wait for the locker assignment. You will be notified by email.
Howto.step6: At the end of the semester you must empty your locker.
